item.title: jk - Configuration as code with TypeScript
item.description: Of all the problems we have confronted, the ones over which the most brain power, ink, and code have been spilled are related to managing configurations â€” Borg, Omega, and Kubernetes - Lessons learned from three container-management systems over a decade This post is the first of a series introducing jk. We will start the series by showing a concrete example of what jk can do for you.
